title: I'm excited to watch Arcane, the new LoL show, for one particular character
body:
{{champion:19}} 

Oh yea. Warwick seems to be tied to Vi and Jinx's history, and I can't wait to see what kind of man Warwick was before his transformation. We know he was formerly a gangster who gave up his life of crime to live a better life, but what did he choose to do? Did he open a business? Did he help solve crimes in Zaun and hunt down the perpetrators? Was he a prize fighter?

His bio leaves a lot to be theorized, but I'd like to think he maybe served as an inspiration for Vi, who herself joined the Wardens. Maybe Warwick is a former gangster, became an investigator, hunted down the criminals who harmed his clients... and this was part of the catalyst that served as his motivations for his new chimeric transformation, who also hunts down the murderers of Zaun.

This is all speculation of course, but it just fuels my desire to watch the new show... which hopefully comes out soon!
